attributes.action: To restrict 2 and 1 hour of after school detentions
attributes.additional_details: Secondary School Usally have after school detention delaying time for students to arrive home and complain to their parents about their arrival I made a petition to restrict it and all student may wish to go home exactly on time some who arrive from the after school detention may possibly get murder however it is not considered unlikely
attributes.background: I’m informing some people that 1 hour and 2 hour after school detentions should be stopped

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
